price: O you who believe, fasting[80] is prescribed upon you as it was prescribed upon those who were before you, so that you may become righteous.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ كُتِبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: [80] To abstain from food, drink, and sexual relations from dawn to dusk.
